Main objects/props featured: Mortar and pestle with green herbs
Two circular logos with a multicolored star and text
VISUAL ELEMENTS.Background environment: Simple gradient background shifting from light turquoise/green to white, with a white rectangular area framing the herbs and logos.

TEXT ELEMENTS.Text placement within frame: Centrally placed in the lower half of the thumbnail, aligned in two lines.

Visual metaphors or symbols: Mortar and pestle symbolize traditional herbal/ayurvedic medicine
Team logos suggest a sense of organization/unity
Clickbait techniques employed: Use of all caps for urgency
Words like 'FIGHTERS' and 'TRAINING' add a sense of action/preparation
Brand elements present: Consistent use of color scheme linked to team/brand identity

THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.Reinforcement: The visuals support the Ayruvedic product and training theme (herbs, mortar, brand logos), echoing the 'PRODUCT KNOWLEDGE AND EXPERIENCE' part of the title.
THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.Contrasts or mismatches: The thumbnail text ('STAR TEAM FIGHTERS TRAINING') emphasizes a team and training angle more than 'product knowledge and experience.' The herbal image visually ties to Ayurveda but the term 'fighters' may introduce ambiguity, as it is not commonly associated with Ayurvedic knowledge alone.
